about.summary: Lua is a powerful, fast, lightweight, embeddable scripting language

name: lua
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "5.1.5" %}

package:
  name: lua
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: lua-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: http://www.lua.org/ftp/lua-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  md5: 2e115fe26e435e33b0d5c022e4490567
  patches:
    # add proper readline support, as well as proper paths for package loading
    - update.patch  # [not win]

build:
  number: 1
  detect_binary_files_with_prefix: true
  skip: True  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - readline 6.2*
    - ncurses 5.9*
  run:
    - readline 6.2*
    - ncurses 5.9*

test:
  commands:
    - lua -v
    - lua -e "print(package.path)"

about:
  home: http://www.lua.org/
  summary: Lua is a powerful, fast, lightweight, embeddable scripting language
  license: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - alexbw
